titleStmt.title: SII 7.795: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 795. (A.R. No. 168 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravatti koneriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ naṭuvilma
ṇṭalattu Irācarācavaḷanāṭṭu paṭṭāṉpākkanāṭṭu Utavittirumāṇikuḻiyil Uṭai
yār tirumāṇikuḻi Āḷuṭaiyanāyaṉār koyil tāṉattārkku Iṉnāyaṉārkku nam
perāl kaṭṭiṉa Irācākkaṇāyaṉcantikkum Irācākkaṇāyaṉtirunāḷaikkum teva
rkaḷtirunāḷaikkum Amutuppaṭi cāttuppaṭi Uḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nittanivantaṅkaḷukku
m viṭṭa Iṉnāyaṉār tirunāmattukkāṇiyāṉa tirumāṇikuḻiyil muṉpilāṇṭukaḷum
pūcaikkuṭalāy potum pacāṉamum naviraiyum puṉceyum māvaṭai kuḷavaṭai tiruttoppu
yam taṟiyiṟai taṭṭārpāṭṭam nilakkūli U muṉpilāṇṭukaḷum pūcaik
ku Iṟaiyiliyāy potum mutal niṅkalāka ṟapil Iṟuttuppotum kārum kāru
m pacāṉanaviraiyil puṟavuṭal puṉpayirum Ivvūr kācāya muḷḷiṭṭu varum mutalu
m Ivvūr nāṉkellaikku Uṭpaṭṭa kāṭu meṭu puṉcey naṉcai Uṭpaṭak koṇṭu
kārpacāṉam navirai cittiraikkārum karumpu ceṅkaḻunir kamuku koḻuntu vāḻaivaḻutilai
mañcaḷ Iñci Uḷḷiṭṭu tām veṇṭum payiṟc ceytukoṇṭu kaṭamai kuṭimai kācu
kaṭamai veṭṭi nimantam nilaiyāḷ kāttikaippoṉvari paṇikkottu pāṭi
kāval Ūrkkaṇakkuppeṟu kāṇiāḷappeṟu cikāriyappeṟu Araikkālvācik
kūli kūṟṟilakkai kaṭaikkūṟṟilakkai viṭaipper mātappaṭi vācalviṉiyo
kam OlaiEḻuttuviṉivokam niṉaippuviṉaivokam Aviṣekakkaikkāṇikkai tulāpārava
ri ciṟṟuvari ceṭṭi vari vari Iṉavari taṭṭārppāṭṭam viṟkāyam māp
paṭṭaṭai Oḻukkunirppāṭṭam Ācupotumakkaḷ perkkaṭamai Uḷḷiṭṭu varum Aṉaittāya
vaṟkkamum Uṭpaṭa Ivvūr Añcāvatumutal mutalaṭaṅka Iṟaiyiliyākat tantom Ippaṭi
kku Ivvolai piṭipāṭākak koṇṭu cantirātittavarai celvatāka kallilum cempilum
veṭṭikkoḷka Ivai ceyyāṉamuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu Ivai pāṇṭimaṇṭalattu muttūṟṟuk
kūṟṟattu Aṭaṅkāramaṅkalattu kākkavallamuṭaiyāṉ tevaṉ pallavarāyaṉ Eḻuttu tulli
yam .
Digital edition of SII 7.795 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
